about_the_game:
Chopping Spree

Welcome to the chillaxing world of chopping trees, where time slows down, and the only rush is the rush you get from numbers going up.

Venerate the Eternal Flame of the Giant Log by feeding it some of the logs you chop and regain energy to keep on chopping.

Why Play Chopping Spree?

Because sometimes life needs a little more simplicity: There is no deep underlying story with twists and turns to keep track of, only the absolute bliss of chopping trees.

The absolutely new and original "log quantity go up"-gameplay can also be combined with other media and/or activities by activating automatic Slimothy-clone spawning. From watching the grass grow outside to taking a spinning class, you can let Slimothy-clones handle the chopping for you.

Features:

  • It's chopping Time: Swing your trusty slime appendage and let the rhythmic bonking of splitting trees wash over you. Keep the flame burning and keep on chopping.

  • Logging upgrades: Visit the cozy campsite and spend logs on upgrades. From faster chopping to a boost in luck, power up your chopping prowess.

  • Unlock abilities: Level up to unlock powerful abilities to bash those pesky trees even faster. From a ninja-like ability to strike faster than the eye can see to summoning an army of Slimothy-clones to strike the trees with you, these abilities make short work of all the trees.

  • Biomes: Explore different biomes and chop away to your heart's content. The glistening Sapphire Thicket, quirky Fungi Forest, magnificent Brown Bog and other all have logs to chop while enjoying the simple things.

  • Achievements: Who doesn't love to catch them all?
